Tallahassee.SAIL High School: SAIL High School is a small public secondary school and a major liberal arts magnet school located in Tallahassee, Florida. The school was formerly known as "School for Applied Individualized Learning" and is now called "A School for Arts and Innovative Learning". SAIL was founded in 1975, partially with the assistance of its former principal, Tallahassee-based education advocate and recently elected Leon County School Board member Rosanne Wood.
